thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Gabriel Schwarz

author: Gabriel Schwarz
title: Gabriel Schwarz
text: I've worked in quite a few office spaces in my time, big corporate to very small team set ups. I was lucky enough to have access to a Servcorp office a few years ago in one of these past jobs - and always looked forward to using the space I had then. It's only become nicer and in more order under the team here. I am now lucky enough to have a permanent office here and can say that the facilities are second to none, and the team are more helpful and friendly than I have experienced in many other corporate environments. I'm only leaving such a glowing review because they truly deserve it!
